alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Louisa, northwestern Goochland and Fluvanna Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 957 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Louisa to near Fork Union. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Louisa around 1000 PM EDT. Columbia around 1020 PM EDT. Kents Store around 1035 PM EDT. Ferncliff around 1040 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Shores, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Cohasset, Waldrop, Tabscott, Trevilians and Wares Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Louisa
